scripts.docker:build: rm -rf build && npm run --prefix ../ client:build && cp -r ../build . && npm run build && docker build -t "time-calc.digitalkaoz.net" .

scripts.docker:push: docker push digitalkaoz/time-calc.digitalkaoz.net:$(git rev-parse --verify HEAD) && docker push digitalkaoz/time-calc.digitalkaoz.net:latest
